<code>

</code>
sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/get-ip-address

sudo nano /etc/network/if-up.d/show-ip-address
<code>
#!/bin/sh

sleep 10s

if [ "$METHOD" = loopback ]; then
    exit 0
fi

# Only run from ifup.
if [ "$MODE" != start ]; then
    exit 0
fi

/usr/local/bin/get-ip-address > /etc/issue
echo "" >> /etc/issue
killall agetty
</code>
